name: New York Cheesecake
author: Kitchen Queen
summary: This cheesecake is New York-style, fool-proof, easy, and super-delicious.
ingredients: 3 (8 ounce) packages cream cheese, room temperature
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Mix together the cracker crumbs, sugar, and butter in a bowl until evenly moistened
Press into the bottom and 1/2 inch up the sides of a 9-inch springform pan
In a large bowl, mix together the cream cheese and sugar with an electric mixer until smooth
Blend in the eggs, 1 tablespoon of vanilla, and cream of tartar
Bake in preheated oven until the center is set, about 50 minutes
Allow to cool on counter for 5 minutes
Mix together the sour cream, 1 teaspoon vanilla, and 1/2 cup sugar in a bowl until smooth; carefully pour over cheesecake starting from the sides of the pan and working your way to the center
Return to oven for another 5 minutes
Allow to cool in pan to room temperature
Refrigerate for at least 6 hours before serving
